item.title: Upgraded a XF551 disk drive to a 3.5" drive
item.description: Back in the late 90s I purchased a large Atari collection on eBay. It's been sitting in storage, just waiting for me to dig into it. I remember I bough it for the Spartados X cartridge and R-time 8, but didn't realize everything else that was in it. I found â€¦
item.dc:creator: gozar
